dmca.title: Bond Consultant Asks Google to Delist Competitor
dmca.body:
JW BOND CONSULTANTS INC
[private]	
NEW HOPE PENNSYLVANIA 	18938

ATTENTION: User Support, DMCA Complaints

1. Our copyrighted text:

http://www.jwsuretybonds.com/badcredit.htm

2. The following site is a modified copy of our page:

http://www.southcoastsurety.com/bad_credit_program.htm

Please find the attached page where I bolded and underlined all sentences which are an exact copy. We originally contacted the company 4/22/04 when the page was an exact copy of ours. They denied it, and have since modified the page. According to copyright law the modified copy is still an infringement. The original infringement broke the following Internet copyright laws:
